sect2.title: Installation of TeX Live
sect2.para: If you started with the binary installer, these instructions will overwrite the programs it installed.

screen.userinput:
export TEXARCH=$(uname -m | sed -e 's/i.86/i386/' -e 's/$/-linux/') && mkdir texlive-build && cd texlive-build &&
../configure \ --prefix=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year; \ --bindir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/bin/$TEXARCH \ --datarootdir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year; \ --includedir=/usr/include \ --infodir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/texmf-dist/doc/info \ --libdir=/usr/lib \ --mandir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/texmf-dist/doc/man \ --disable-native-texlive-build \ --disable-static --enable-shared \ --with-system-cairo \ --with-system-fontconfig \ --with-system-freetype2 \ --with-system-graphite2 \ --with-system-harfbuzz \ --with-system-icu \ --with-system-libgs \ --with-system-libpng \ --with-system-pixman \ --with-system-poppler \ --with-system-xpdf \ --with-system-zlib \ --with-banner-add=" - BLFS" \ --enable-xindy \ --enable-xindy-rules \ --enable-xindy-doc \ --with-clisp-runtime=system

sect2.para: Asymptote has to be separately configured. It ships with its own copy of the gc source tarball, and will only use the system version if that local source is removed.

screen.userinput:
pushd ../utils/asymptote && rm -v gc-7.4.0.tar.gz &&
echo "ac_cv_lib_m_sqrt=yes" >config.cache && echo "ac_cv_lib_z_deflate=yes" >>config.cache &&
./configure LIBS="-ltirpc " \ --prefix=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/ \ --bindir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/bin/$TEXARCH \ --enable-texlive-build \ --datarootdir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/texmf-dist \ --infodir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/texmf-dist/doc/info \ --mandir=/opt/texlive/&texlive-year;/texmf-dist/doc/man \ --cache-file=config.cache && && popd && unset TEXARCH &&
make && make -C ../utils/asymptote

sect2.para: To test the results, issue: make -k check && make -C utils/asymptote check.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: echo "ac_cv_lib_m_sqrt=yes" ... LIBS="-ltirpc " >config.cache, ... --cache-file=config.cache : The configure scripts in TeX Live are uncommon. Asymptote not only has to be separately configured and built, the configure script fails to find the shared libtirpc.so. Passing that in LIBS breaks the tests for (static) libm and (shared) libz, so we have to fix things up, in much the same way as when cross-compiling.
--without-x: use this (and omit the configure and make in utils/asymptote if you do not have Xorg installed.
